section.title: Dynamic Field Template for Admin Dialog Example
section.para: The template is the place where the HTML code of the dialog is stored.

section.title: Code Example:
section.para: In this section an Admin Dialog template for the password Dynamic Field is shown and explained.

section.para: This is common header that can be found in common OTRS modules.

para.programlisting:

section.para: This is part of the code has the main box and also the actions side bar, no modifications are needed in this section.

para.programlisting: <div class="ContentColumn"> <form action="[% Env("CGIHandle") %]" method="post" class="Validate PreventMultipleSubmits"> <input type="hidden" name="Action" value="AdminDynamicFieldPassword" /> <input type="hidden" name="Subaction" value="[% Data.Mode | html %]Action" /> <input type="hidden" name="ObjectType" value="[% Data.ObjectType | html %]" /> <input type="hidden" name="FieldType" value="[% Data.FieldType | html %]" /> <input type="hidden" name="ID" value="[% Data.ID | html %]" />

section.para: In this section of the code is defined the right part of the dialog, notice that the value of the Action hidden input must match with the name of the Admin Dialog.
